      The JDK version to which the byte codes should be transformed.

    • hasFeature

      public boolean hasFeature​(Features feature)
      Checks whether the given feature is in the list of features to transform.
      Parameters:
      feature - the feature
      Returns:
      true if the feature is present of if force option is enabled false otherwise.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • write

      public void write​(java.nio.file.Path path, java.lang.String className, byte[] bytes)
      Writes the given bytecode in the class file className on the file system relative to path.

      Note: the bytecode will not be written on the disk until #save() method is called.
      Parameters:
      path - path where to write the class.
      className - class name (without an extension)..
      bytecode - bytecode to write.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the arguments is null.

    • write

      public void write​(java.nio.file.Path path, byte[] bytecode)
      Writes the given bytecode at path on the file system.

      Note: the bytecode will not be written on the disk until #save() method is called.
      Parameters:
      path - path where to write the bytecode.
      bytecode - bytecode to write.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the arguments is null.

    • bytecode

      public void bytecode​(java.nio.file.Path path, java.lang.String clazz, java.util.function.BiConsumer<java.nio.file.Path,​byte[]> consumer) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.io.IOException
      Gets the bytecode of the class className relative to the given path.

      The method will always return the last modified version of the bytecode since program the class is created.
      Parameters:
      path - path where to search the class.
      className - class name
      consumer - bytecode consumer.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the arguments is null.

    • detectFeature

      public void detectFeature​(java.nio.file.Path path, Features feature, FeatureDescriber describer)
      Handles feature detection.
      Parameters:
      path - path where the feature is detected.
      feature - the feature.
      describer - feature describer.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the arguments is null.
